mapper.select:
select PROGRAM_UUID as PROGRAM_UUID, NO as no, MACHINE_TYPE_UUID as machineTypeUuid, MACHINE_NAME as machineName, PROGRAM_NAME as programName, VERSION as version, FILE_PATH as filePath, FILE_NAME as fileName, as insertUuid, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, as updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, DESCRIPTION as description from ST_PROGRAM
1=1
